lenon_lin wrote:

> In Junit'frameworks ,there are not the function of main();
> how can i do ? and can i customize a function of main()?

Can you clarify?

It is common to write main() in each Test Case class like this.

public class MyTestCase extends TestCase {
     // ... tests ...
     public static void main(String[] args) {
         junit.textui.TestRunner.main(args);
     }
}

Does this help you?
